name: Moots AI
long_description:
Every breakthrough begins with a meeting, a spark between ambitious minds.But in a world that moves fast, most connections fade. Names blur. Opportunities vanish. Moots remembers.

Moots is the connection network for leaders, founders, and innovators who move the world forward. Powered by AI, it transforms every meeting, event, and introduction into momentum — helping you remember who you met, why they matter, and what you can build together.

What you can do with Moots:

• Event Networking – See who’s in the room before you arrive.
• AI Matching – Meet the right people at any event.
• Smart Dossiers – Capture context, notes, and insights automatically.
• Follow-Ups & Reminders – Turn fleeting encounters into lasting opportunities.

Whether you’re closing deals, finding partners, or building something new — Moots is the network behind the next big thing.
